data.fullContent: The town had wanted a new park for a long time, but the town council could never agree on where to build it. They had considered building it downtown, but this would've involved closing the downtown area for far too long to be practical. Another proposal was to build the park along the river, but this location was only convenient for people who lived on the south side of town, so this idea was also rejected. At last, one of the council members suggested building it in a big field behind the old library building, which had been abandoned for over 10 years. The idea was approved, and construction began immediately. Now the park is open, and the townsfolk are enjoying its many attractions.

q1.translation: 该镇很久以来就想要一个新的公园，但镇议会一直未能就在哪里建公园达成一致意见。他们曾考虑把它建在市中心，但这将涉及关闭市中心地区太长时间，不现实。另一个方案是沿河建造公园，但是这个位置只方便住在城南的人，所以这个想法也被否决了。最后，一位理事会成员建议把它建在废弃了10多年的旧图书馆后面的一块大空地上。

Another proposal was to build the park along the river, but this location was only convenient for people who lived on the south side of town, so this idea was also rejected. At last, one of the council members suggested building it in a big field behind the old library building, which had been abandoned for over 10 years.
